elements.name: Accessing About Us page

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks the About Us button
the About Us modal should be displayed

elements.name: Successfully adding a product to the Cart after login

steps.name: the user is on the Login page
the user enters a valid "ronaldo" and a valid "Password"
the user clicks the Login button
the user should be logged in successfully
the user should see their "ronaldo" displayed on the page
I click on the "Phones" category
I click on the "Samsung galaxy s7" product
I click the "Add to cart" button
I should see a confirmation message saying "Product added"
the product should be added to my cart

elements.name: Successfully adding a product to the Cart after login and validate price

steps.name: the user is on the Login page
the user enters a valid "ronaldo" and a valid "Password"
the user clicks the Login button
the user should be logged in successfully
the user should see their "ronaldo" displayed on the page
I click on the "Phones" category
I click on the "Samsung galaxy s7" product
I click the "Add to cart" button
I should see a confirmation message saying "Product added"
the product should be added to my cart
The total price should be calculated correctly

elements.name: User successfully places an order from the cart

steps.name: User is on the Cart page
User clicks on the Place Order button
I fill in the order form with my details
User clicks on the "Purchase" button
a confirmation message should be displayed with the order ID
the cart should be empty

elements.name: Successful Submission of Contact Form

steps.name: I am on the "Contact" page of DemoBlaze
I fill in the Email field with "johndoe@example.com"
I fill in the Name field with "John Doe"
I fill in the Message field with "Can you provide more details about the features and pricing? Thank you!"

arguments.val: "Can you provide more details about the features and pricing? Thank you!"

steps.name: I click the Send message button
the user should see a confirmation message saying "Thanks for the message!!"

elements.name: Successful Submission of Contact Form

steps.name: I am on the "Contact" page of DemoBlaze
I fill in the Email field with "johnnydepp@example.com"
I fill in the Name field with "johnny depp"
I fill in the Message field with "Hi, I'm Johnny Depp, I want free products"

arguments.val: "Hi, I'm Johnny Depp, I want free products"

steps.name: I click the Send message button
the user should see a confirmation message saying "Thanks for the message!!"

elements.name: Close Contact Form

elements.name: Successfully navigating to a product details page

steps.name: I am on the DemoBlaze homepage
I click on a product titled "Samsung galaxy s6"
I should be redirected to the product details page for "Samsung galaxy s6"
I should see the product's price
I should see the product's description

  Actual : I should see a confirmation message saying "Product added"

name: Home Page Product Navigation
description:
As a user
  I want to navigate to the product details page
  So that I can view more information about a product

elements.name: Successful user login

steps.name: the user is on the Login page
the user enters a valid "ronaldo" and a valid "Password"
the user clicks the Login button
the user should be logged in successfully
the user should see their "ronaldo" displayed on the page

elements.name: Login with an incorrect username and password,non-existent username,empty username and password

steps.name: the user is on the Login page
the user enters a valid "ronaldo" and a valid "Pass"
the user clicks the Login button
the user should see a confirmation message saying "Wrong password"

elements.name: Login with an incorrect username and password,non-existent username,empty username and password

steps.name: the user is on the Login page
the user enters a valid "ronaldo" and a valid ""
the user clicks the Login button
the user should see a confirmation message saying "Please fill out Username and Password."

the user enters a valid "" and a valid "password"
the user clicks the Login button
the user should see a confirmation message saying "Please fill out Username and Password."
